timestamp.description: ISO 8601 formatted timestamp indicating when the data was recorded.

thought.description: A brief description or categorization of the individual's thought process at the time of recording.

intention.description: The intended action or goal of the individual corresponding to the recorded thought.

signalHertz.description: Frequency of the physiological signal measured in Hertz (Hz).

action.description: The physical action performed by the individual at the time of recording.

spoken_words.description: Verbatim transcript of words spoken by the individual.

name.description: Full name of the individual being analyzed.
